articles.title: Daura Gold Commences Exploration at Latin Metals’  Cerro Bayo Project, Santa Cruz Province, Argentina
articles.mainIdea: Daura Gold Commences Exploration at Latin Metals’ Cerro Bayo Project, Santa Cruz Province, Argentina
articles.summary: GlobeNewswire: Daura Gold Commences Exploration at Latin Metals’ Cerro Bayo Project, Santa Cruz Province, Argentina. Announces $1.79 Million Option and Warrant ExerciseVANCOUVER, British Columbia, Dec. 22, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Latin Metals Inc. ("Latin Metals" or the "Company") (TSXV: LMS) (OTCQB: LMSQF) reports that option partner Daura Gold Corp. ("Daura") (TSXV: DGC) has commenced induced polarization ("IP") geophysical surveying across the Cerro Bayo gold-silver project (the "Project") (Figure 1) in the Deseado Massif, Santa Cruz Province, Argentina. Daura has an option (the "Option") to earn up to 80% Related tickers mentioned: DGCOF, GC=F, LMSQF, SI=F.

articles.title: Outcry follows CBS pulling program on prison key to Trump deportations
articles.mainIdea: Outcry follows CBS pulling program on prison key to Trump deportations
articles.summary: AFP: Outcry follows CBS pulling program on prison key to Trump deportations. The leadership of CBS News was facing accusations of political meddling on Monday over a last-minute decision to not air a report on the notorious Salvadoran prison where US President Donald Trump has sent deported migrants.CBS, which was purchased by the Trump-linked Ellison family earlier this year, said that the prison report needed "additional reporting."

articles.title: Fulgent Genetics Agrees to Acquire Bako Diagnostics and StrataDx
articles.mainIdea: Fulgent Genetics Agrees to Acquire Bako Diagnostics and StrataDx
articles.summary: Business Wire: Fulgent Genetics Agrees to Acquire Bako Diagnostics and StrataDx. EL MONTE, Calif., December 22, 2025--Fulgent Genetics, Inc. (NASDAQ: FLGT) ("Fulgent"), a technology-based company with a well-established laboratory services business and a therapeutic development business, today announced that it has entered into a definitive agreement to acquire selected assets of Bako Diagnostics ("Bako"), a premier pathology laboratory headquartered in Alpharetta, GA and to acquire StrataDx, a premier dermatopathology laboratory located in Lexington, MA. Fulgent will acquir Related tickers mentioned: FLGT.
